mapper.update: update PAGE_TEMPLET set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=OTHER}, CHANNEL = #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, C_BY = #{cBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, M_BY = #{mBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_TIME = #{cTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, M_TIME = #{mTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_DEL = #{isDel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TEMP_TYPE = #{tempType,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
